resources.string: For information on the different parts of this app, read the following tips.
This is the icon for new remind. If you want to add new reminder, you can simply click this icon to add new remind for your need.
This is the icon to edit your remind. It locates at head of the detailed page. If you want to edit your remind for better, simply click this icon. We handle your editing quickly.
This is delete button for you if you want to delete any reminders that you dont want. The deleted reminders should be completed reminders or reminds that is not happened.
This is the menu icon for other options such as help and feedback. We would like to know your opinions and want to help you if your are in trouble.
